name: recommendations(fromUsers:maxCount:restrictingToItems:excluding:excludingObserved:)
desc: Retrieves the highest scored item for the given array of users, based on item similarity and the rating column.
declaration: func recommendations(fromUsers: [MLIdentifier], maxCount: Int = 10, restrictingToItems: [MLIdentifier]? = nil, excluding userItemObservations: MLDataTable? = nil, excludingObserved: Bool = true) throws -> MLDataTable
